# title

**Instance Property**

The localized title displayed to a person.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Define the value of this property as a parameter to the request initializer:  [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTaskRequest/init(identifier:title:subtitle:)]. After that, this property is read only, however you can update the title by calling [doc://com.apple.backgroundtasks/documentation/BackgroundTasks/BGContinuedProcessingTask/updateTitle(_:subtitle:)].

## Titling the task

- **subtitle**: The localized subtitle displayed to a person.
- **updateTitle(_:subtitle:)**: Update the task title and subtitle that the system displays to a person.
